HEYYYYYY!! Christopher told me you were coming to work here but I didn't know it would be so soon! How have you been??

sequence.msg: That's so great to hear! It's been way too long since we've seen each other. We should hang out soon! Christopher has these awesome gummies that you really need to try. The three of us can eat them and hang out just like after we shipped a game when we were in school. I'M SO GLAD YOU'RE HERE!
OH! I'm so sorry but my heat level is rising so I gotta fly to cool down my reactor. But don't be a stranger! Message me anytime! Talk to you soon!

Yeah, same here. Though Christopher has these new gummies that have definitely helped. You should hang out with us sometime soon and try them- it can be just like old times! Also Mr. Spoons has gotten SO BIG since you last saw him- he's like double the size since he was a kitten! He's still a huge snuggle bug though so I know he'll jump right on your lap to get your world-famous snuggles. Well, world-famous to me anyway. :) I MISS YOUR HUGS! You give such amazing hugs! I've just missed you so much!
I'm so so sorry but my heat level is getting bad so I have to go press my button. Message me anytime, seriously! I love talking to you!

OH NO! I'm so sorry to hear that! *BIG HUGS!* We need to hang out so I can give you real hugs. We can get Christopher and do our legendary cuddle huddles! :) I really wish I had known you were going through a tough time so I could help sooner. We're friends forever, remember?
